prompts: Create a purple Pokemon that resembles a blob with unique features and interesting abilities.
Imagine a gelatinous creature with a friendly demeanor that loves to explore wetlands.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings using its vibrant colors and shapes.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a unique combat style.
Make a creature that embodies the essence of poison-type and has a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a squishy body and a penchant for adventure in grassy areas.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that has distinctive black diamond patterns and a charming look.
